name: Startpage Nicer Title Extension
description:
Discover the perfect blend of privacy and convenience with this Chrome extension designed specifically for Startpage users. While Startpage is renowned for its exceptional privacy features, including not storing search keywords in the browser's <title> tag, this can make tab management challenging, especially when you have multiple searches open at the same time.

This extension offers a seamless solution: it smartly integrates search keywords into the window title of each Startpage tab. This means you can enjoy the high-level privacy you love about Startpage, without sacrificing the ease of navigating between multiple search results. With this extension, you can effortlessly identify and switch to the tab you need, enhancing your browsing experience while keeping your searches private and secure.
